channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As Told To: An Oral History of Baker Mayfield's Legendary 2022 Rams Debut
item.description: We look back on a wild week in 2022 when Baker Mayfield joined the Rams on a Tuesday night and led them to victory two days later.

item.title: United States vs Uruguay: How to Watch, Prediction, Friendly Preview
item.description: Preview Venezuela vs Canada in today's international friendly with TV info, start time, and key storylines ahead of kickoff.

item.title: Venezuela vs Canada: How to Watch, Prediction, Friendly Preview
item.description: Preview Venezuela vs Canada in today's international friendly with TV info, start time, and key storylines ahead of kickoff.

item.title: Last Night in College Basketball: A Half-Court (Banked!) Buzzer Beater to Win
item.description: An unbelievable heave for a win, DePaul couldn't hit a free throw and paid for it, a scoring leader off the bench, a 20-rebound night and more from Mo...

item.title: Trinidad and Tobago vs Bermuda: How to Watch, World Cup Qualifying Preview
item.description: Preview Trinidad and Tobago vs Bermuda in World Cup Qualifying with TV info, start time, betting odds, and recent form ahead of kickoff.

item.title: Offseason grades: Mariners re-sign Naylor in winter's first big move
item.description: We've got you covered with grades and analysis on every winter signing and big offseason trade.

item.title: Passan's MLB offseason preview: Every signing or trade we could see this winter
item.description: From the big-name signing to the could-be trade, Jeff Passan breaks down the winter to come.

item.title: 'Cool and new thing for me': Zdeno Chara on entrepreneurship, his new job with the Bruins and more
item.description: Since retiring from the NHL, Chara hasn't slowed down at all. We caught up with the former Bruins captain, who opened up about his life and goals outs...

item.title: 'I wouldn't be here without him:' Why Daniel Jones is leaning on a longtime Peyton Manning confidant
item.description: Jones leaned on David Cutcliffe during his struggles with the Giants and even after losing to Pittsburgh this season.

item.title: Prescott, Pickens star as Cowboys honor Marshawn Kneeland with big win
item.description: The Cowboys honored the memory of late teammate Marshawn Kneeland with a convincing win.
